import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Mint an Issuer NFT

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [Wallet](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create the [`MintNftParams`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.MintNftParams.html)
    and add immutable data by calling the [`MintNftParams.with_immutable_metadata()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/operations/transaction/high_level/minting/mint_nfts/struct.MintNftParams.html#method.with_immutable_metadata)
    function and adding the [`MetadataFeature`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/output/feature/metadata/struct.MetadataFeature.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.rs#L50C9-L56
```

</div>

3. Mint the NFT by calling [`Wallet.mint_nft()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.mint_nfts).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.rs#L57
```

</div>

4. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.rs#L81-L83
```

</div>

6. Get the NFT's ID from the outputs that were created by de transaction by creating a new
    [`OutputId`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/output/struct.OutputId.html)
    from the NFT transaction to get the `output_id` and passing that value to
    [`NftId::from()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/output/nft/struct.NftId.html#impl-From%3C%26OutputId%3E-for-NftId).
    Take note of it so you can use it as the issuer of the [NFT collection](mint-collection.mdx).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.rs#L61-L70
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create the [`MintNftParams`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/MintNftParams/)
    and add immutable data by passing the [`MintNftParams.immutableMetadata`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/MintNftParams/#immutablemetadata) param.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.ts#L50-L54
```

</div>

3. Mint the NFT by calling [`Wallet.mintNfts()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#mintnfts).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nfts/mint_nft.ts#L58-L62
```

</div>

4. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
[`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.ts#L57-L60
```

</div>

6. Get the NFT's ID from the outputs that were created by de transaction by calling
    [`Utils.computeOutputId()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Utils/#computeoutputid) function
    to get the `outputId` and passing that value to
    [`Utils.computeNftId()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Utils/#computenftid).
    Take note of it so you can use it as the issuer of the [NFT collection](mint-collection.mdx).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.ts#L62-L81
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create the [`MintNftParams`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/send_params/#mintnftparams-objects)
    and add immutable data by setting the `MintNftParams.immutable_metadata` attribute.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.py#L22-L25
```

</div>

2. Mint the NFT using the [`Wallet.mint_nfts()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#mint_nfts) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.py#L28
```

</div>


4. Await for the transaction to get accepted by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#wait_for_transaction_acceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.py#L30-L31
```

</div>

5. Get the NFT's ID from the outputs that were created by de transaction by calling
[`Utils.compute_output_id()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/utils/#compute_output_id) function
to get the `output_id` and passing that value to
[`Utils.compute_output_id()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/utils/#compute_nft_id).
Take note of it so you can use it as the issuer of the [NFT collection](mint-collection.mdx).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/nft_collection/00_mint_issuer_nft.py#L38-L43
```

</div>
</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output
